8. **Innovating Performance Metrics**: Exploring new advertising KPIs (16%) means companies will identify and track new metrics that better align with their strategic goals, such as engagement rates, customer lifetime value, or brand sentiment.

9. **Increasing Brand Voice**: To increase their share of voice (14%), companies will try to out-communicate competitors through more aggressive marketing and broader ad placements.

Other initiatives with lower priority percentages might include adopting sustainable practices, supporting minority-owned media, and shifting towards performance-based advertising contracts. Companies are likely to scrutinize their strategies and ensure they align with these goals to improve their competitive stance in the market.
